mapper.select: select c.comment_id, c.comment_content,c.comment_time, c.user_id, c.meeting_id, u.nickname ,count(r.reply_id) replyCnt from comments c join users u on c.user_id = u.user_id left outer join replies r on c.comment_id = r.comment_id where c.comment_id = #{commentId} group by c.comment_id, c.comment_content, c.comment_time, c.user_id, c.meeting_id, u.nickname
select r.reply_id, r.reply_content, r.reply_time, r.user_id, r.comment_id, u.nickname from replies r join users u on r.user_id = u.user_id where r.comment_id = #{commentId} order by reply_id ASC
mapper.insert: insert into replies(reply_id, reply_content, reply_time, user_id, comment_id) values(pet.reply_id_seq.nextVal, #{replyContent}, sysdate , #{userId}, #{commentId})
